languages.text: "Идира сломала комм-бусину, так что мне не удалось что-либо узнать от нее. Но, Лорд-капитан... Идира — псайкер, и мы с вами в варпе. Если кто-то и рискнет отправиться в этот отсек, то только вы, иначе... иначе мы больше никогда не увидим ее. Молю вас, Лорд-капитан, не оставьте эту весть без внимания".

traits.locale_text: "Идира сломала комм-бусину, так что мне не удалось что-либо узнать. Но, Лорд-капитан... Идира – псайкер. Неужели Губительные силы отравили ее разум, и она совершила чудовищное преступление против самой жизни? Или горе о леди фон Валанциус подтолкнуло ее к иной ереси? Или все это – огромное недоразумение?.. Молю вас, Лорд-капитан, не оставьте эту весть без внимания".

languages.text: "Idira broke her micro-bead so I wasn't able to find out anything from her. But, Lord Captain... Idira is a psyker, and we are in the warp. You are the only one who would risk setting foot in that compartment. And if you do not... if you do not, we will never see Idira again. I beg you, Lord Captain, do not ignore this matter."
languages.original_text: "Идира сломала комм-бусину, так что мне не удалось что-либо узнать от нее. Но, Лорд-капитан... Идира — псайкер, и мы с вами в варпе. Если кто-то и рискнет отправиться в этот отсек, то только вы, иначе... иначе мы больше никогда не увидим ее. Молю вас, Лорд-капитан, не оставьте эту весть без внимания".

traits.locale_text: "Idira broke her microbead so I wasn't able to learn anything from her. But, Lord Captain... Idira is a psyker, and we are in the warp. If anyone risks venturing into this compartment, it will be you, otherwise... otherwise we will never see Idira again. I beg you, Lord Captain, do not ignore this news."

"Idira broke her microbead so I wasn't able to learn anything from her. But, Lord Captain... Idira is a psyker, and we are in the warp. If anyone risks venturing into this compartment, it will be you, otherwise... otherwise we will never see Idira again. I beg you, Lord Captain, do not ignore this news."

"Idira broke her micro-bead so I wasn't able to find out anything from her. But, Lord Captain... Idira is a psyker, and we are in the warp. You are the only one who would risk setting foot in that compartment. And if you do not... if you do not, we will never see Idira again. I beg you, Lord Captain, do not ignore this matter."

"Idira broke her micro-bead so I wasn't able to find out anything from her. But, Lord Captain... Idira is a psyker, and we are in the warp. You are the only one who would risk setting foot in that compartment. And if you do not... if you do not, we will never see Idira again. I beg you, Lord Captain, do not ignore this matter."

"Idira broke her micro-bead so I wasn't able to find out anything from her. But, Lord Captain... Idira is a psyker, and we are in the warp. You are the only one who would risk setting foot in that compartment. And if you do not... if you do not, we will never see Idira again. I beg you, Lord Captain, do not ignore this matter."

languages.text: “伊迪拉把她的通讯珠弄坏了，所以我没能从她那里得知任何情况。不过，舰长大人……伊迪拉是位灵能者，我们又是在亚空间里。唯一愿意冒险进入那片区域的人，恐怕就只有您了。如果您……如果您不打算管这件事情，我们恐怕就再也见不到伊迪拉了。我求您了，舰长大人，不要熟视无睹。”
languages.original_text: "Idira broke her micro-bead so I wasn't able to find out anything from her. But, Lord Captain... Idira is a psyker, and we are in the warp. You are the only one who would risk setting foot in that compartment. And if you do not... if you do not, we will never see Idira again. I beg you, Lord Captain, do not ignore this matter."

traits.locale_text: “伊迪拉把她的通讯珠弄坏了，所以我没能从她那里得知任何情况。不过，舰长大人……伊迪拉是位灵能者，我们又是在亚空间里。唯一愿意冒险进入那片区域的人，恐怕就只有您了。如果您……如果您不打算管这件事情，我们恐怕就再也见不到伊迪拉了。我求您了，舰长大人，不要熟视无睹。”

languages.text: «Idira rompió su microcuenta así que no he podido sacar nada en claro sobre ella. Pero Lord Capitán... Idira es psíquica y estamos en la disformidad. Solo usted se arriesgaría a entrar en ese compartimento. Y si no... si no lo hace, no volveremos a ver a Idira. Se lo ruego, Lord Capitán, no ignore esta situación».
languages.original_text: "Idira broke her micro-bead so I wasn't able to find out anything from her. But, Lord Captain... Idira is a psyker, and we are in the warp. You are the only one who would risk setting foot in that compartment. And if you do not... if you do not, we will never see Idira again. I beg you, Lord Captain, do not ignore this matter."

traits.locale_text: «Idira rompió su microcuenta así que no he podido sacar nada en claro sobre ella. Pero Lord Capitán... Idira es psíquica y estamos en la disformidad. Solo usted se arriesgaría a entrar en ese compartimento. Y si no... si no lo hace, no volveremos a ver a Idira. Se lo ruego, Lord Capitán, no ignore esta situación».

languages.text: "Idira hat ihre Mikroperle zerbrochen, weshalb ich nichts über sie herausfinden konnte. Aber Lord Captain ... Idira ist eine Psionikerin und wir sind im Warp. Außer Euch würde niemand riskieren, einen Fuß in diese Abteilung zu setzen. Und wenn Ihr es nicht tut ... werden wir Idira nie wiedersehen. Ich flehe Euch an, Lord Captain, ignoriert diese Angelegenheit nicht."
languages.original_text: "Idira broke her micro-bead so I wasn't able to find out anything from her. But, Lord Captain... Idira is a psyker, and we are in the warp. You are the only one who would risk setting foot in that compartment. And if you do not... if you do not, we will never see Idira again. I beg you, Lord Captain, do not ignore this matter."

traits.locale_text: "Idira broke her micro-bead so I wasn't able to find out anything from her. But, Lord Captain... Idira is a psyker, and we are in the warp. You are the only one who would risk setting foot in that compartment. And if you do not... if you do not, we will never see Idira again. I beg you, Lord Captain, do not ignore this matter."

languages.text: « Idira a brisé son micro-vox, ce qui m'empêche de savoir ce qu'il est d'advenu d'elle. Cependant, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... Idira est une psyker, et nous sommes dans le Warp. Nul autre que vous n'oserait prendre le risque de pénétrer dans ce compartiment. Et si vous ne le faites pas... nous ne reverrons plus jamais Idira. Je vous en supplie, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, n'ignorez pas cette requête. »
languages.original_text: "Idira broke her micro-bead so I wasn't able to find out anything from her. But, Lord Captain... Idira is a psyker, and we are in the warp. You are the only one who would risk setting foot in that compartment. And if you do not... if you do not, we will never see Idira again. I beg you, Lord Captain, do not ignore this matter."

traits.locale_text: « Idira a brisé son micro-vox, ce qui m'empêche de savoir ce qu'il est d'advenu d'elle. Cependant, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... Idira est une psyker, et nous sommes dans le Warp. Nul autre que vous n'oserait prendre le risque de pénétrer dans ce compartiment. Et si vous ne le faites pas... nous ne reverrons plus jamais Idira. Je vous en supplie, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, n'ignorez pas cette requête. »

languages.text: 「イディラは彼女のマイクロベッドを壊してしまったので、何も情報を引き出せませんでした。ですが、ロード・キャプテン…イディラは異能者で、今は歪みの中。危険を冒して踏み出せるのはあなただけです。そうでないと…我々はイディラに二度と会えないでしょう。お願いです、ロード・キャプテン、どうかこの件にご対応ください」
languages.original_text: "Idira broke her micro-bead so I wasn't able to find out anything from her. But, Lord Captain... Idira is a psyker, and we are in the warp. You are the only one who would risk setting foot in that compartment. And if you do not... if you do not, we will never see Idira again. I beg you, Lord Captain, do not ignore this matter."

traits.locale_text: 「イディラは彼女のマイクロベッドを壊してしまったので、何も情報を引き出せませんでした。ですが、ロード・キャプテン…イディラは異能者で、今は歪みの中。危険を冒して踏み出せるのはあなただけです。そうでないと…我々はイディラに二度と会えないでしょう。お願いです、ロード・キャプテン、どうかこの件にご対応ください」

languages.text: "İdira, mikro telsizini bozdu. Kendisine dair herhangi bir bilgim yok. Ama Lord Kaptan... İdira bir ruhsezer ve biz de öteboyuttayız. O kompartımana ayak basma riskine girebilecek tek kişi sizsiniz. Eğer bunu yapmazsanız... Bunu yapmazsanız İdira'yı bir daha göremeyiz. Size yalvarıyorum Lord Kaptan, bu konuyu göz ardı etmeyin."
languages.original_text: "Idira broke her micro-bead so I wasn't able to find out anything from her. But, Lord Captain... Idira is a psyker, and we are in the warp. You are the only one who would risk setting foot in that compartment. And if you do not... if you do not, we will never see Idira again. I beg you, Lord Captain, do not ignore this matter."
